"I just felt like I was back home," Allen Iverson said. It was deja vu. Just a real good feeling. The fans made it hard on me because they made me more nervous than I already was. The Nuggets did their share to ruin Allen Iverson 's homecoming. Denver scored the first 14 points of the fourth quarter to rally for its fourth straight win.
